_header: When Sharp and Fairfield are married in fere

RylandsLat228.Transcription:
QWhen sharpe & fairfeld ar maried in fereþan shal al Ingland
                    be at shelde & at spereYit sall the fadir tell to þe
                    soneþat of a cursed mariage sall neuere gode come
RylandsLat228.Attributed Title:
Quoddam prouerbium Antiquum Siue Plaqium futurorum in Anglico sermone
                    (f. 49v)
